class media_manager.plugins.batchdownloadmanager.searchengines.GenericGetter.GenericGetter(search_term)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that defines interfaces for modules that search xdcc pack lists

get_channel(bot)[source]¶

Checks to which channel a given bot belongs to :param bot: the bot to check for :return: the channel

get_server(bot)[source]¶

Checks to which server a given bot belongs to. :param bot: the bot’s name to be used :return: the server name

search()[source]¶

Conducts the search :return: the search results as a list of XDCCPack objects
